text:
Bianca Lorena Tirsin (born 1998 in Arad, Romania) is a Romanian model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Universe Romania 2020.
Miss Supranational.
Tirsin joined and was crowned Miss Supranational Romania 2017 pageant and she will represent her country at Miss Supranational 2017 pageant in Poland and placed as the second runner-up.
Miss International.
Tirsin joined again and was crowned Miss International Romania 2018 and she will represent Romania at Miss International 2018 pageant in Tokyo, Japan and placed as the third runner-up.
Miss Universe.
On December 1, 2020, Tirsin was crowned as Miss Universe Romania 2020 and she will represent Romania at Miss Universe 2020 pageant.
